channel.title: Writing on Alexander Gaura
channel.description: Recent content in Writing on Alexander Gaura

item.title: About
item.description: Hey there! I’m a software developer with a focus on imaging, color management, and visualization. I graduated from a master’s program in Imaging and Light in Extended Reality in 2022 and received my bachelor’s degree in Mathematics from Princeton University in 2020. This website mostly functions as a way for me to teach myself and strengthen my understanding of what I like to study, as well as provide a space in which some of my projects can live.
